Trade/Device Name(s): IMMAGE Systems Low Concentration Immunoglobulin A Reagent
IMMAGE Systems Low Concentration Immunoglobulin A (IGALC) Reagent
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D and E immunological systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IMMAGE Systems Low Concentration Immunoglobulin A Reagent for quantitative measurement of immunoglobulin A in serum and cerebrospinal fluid by rate nephelometry
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of Low Concentration Immunoglobulin A (IGALC) in human serum or cerebrospinal fluid by rate nephelometry to detect increased blood-CSF barrier permeability and intrathecal synthesis of immunoglobulins.
